title:
Microsoft Corp. stock underperforms Monday when compared to competitors 
despite daily gains
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.15%
       rose 1.89% to $374.69 Monday, on what proved to be an all-around favorable trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        -0.14%
       rising 1.41% to 4,763.54 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        -0.77%
       rising 0.58% to 37,683.01. The stock's rise snapped a four-day losing streak. Microsoft Corp. closed $9.61 below its 52-week high ($384.30), which the company reached on November 29th. The stock underperformed when compared to some of its competitors Monday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        +0.53%
       rose 2.42% to $185.56, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +2.04%
       rose 2.29% to $140.53, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +2.15%
       rose 2.29% to $138.84. Trading volume (22.3 M) remained 4.5 million below its 50-day average volume of 26.8 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use.
